author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Is there an esoteric subject that Adam Savage wishes the news reported on? What’s a passion franchise Adam feels deserves more attention? Does he own any LEGO Grogu figures, and how does he find garage sales? In this live stream Adam answers this question from Thomas Esson, ThePstyron, the gr8 brandino and legojerry, whom we thank for their support! What subject do you wish the news would cover?

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:

title: Adam Savage Wishes the News Would Cover This Subject
